resources.string: A Fragment represents a reusable portion of your app\'s UI. A fragment defines and manages its own layout, has its own lifecycle, and can handle its own input events. Two ways to add fragment ,in the layout and by programmatically
Fragments benefits are modular in nature, light weight , reusable, compatible with android x libraries function
We can communicate with fragments with the help of so many ways, the most popular is through interface , another advanced way is viewmodel
